item.title: tryhackme: overpass2
item.description: i’m going to talk about one of my favourite rooms on thm, and that is overpass 2. overpass 2 is the 7th room in the “advanced exploitation” chapter, of the “offensive pentesting” path. it’s also the 2nd room in the overpass series, which is about a bunch of computer science students trying to run a company called “overpass”. this room is interesting and different because the “target” in question has already been hacked, and it’s our job to figure out how and if we can use the information left behind by the attacker to get back into the overpass network.
